name: Whirlpool Icons
description: Magical or natural whirlpools create dangerous maritime hazards and potential access to underwater passages. The swirling water can drag ships to their doom, while the unique conditions might support strange sea creatures or hide underwater passages.
atmosphere: Powerful whirlpools create deadly maritime hazards while swirling currents hide underwater passages and caves. Strange creatures adapted to the turbulent conditions thrive in the chaotic waters. Rushing water carries maritime danger. Ships avoid these treacherous areas where the sea itself becomes a weapon.
